body:
Comment 14: 
Ok, this is part of newstack:


.00408454: 81C100F7FFFF                   add         ecx,0FFFFF700
.0040845A: 39C8                           cmp         eax,ecx
.0040845C: 7342                           jnc        .0004084A0
.0040845E: B88DF34100                     mov         eax,00041F38D ;'runtime: split
stack overflow: %p < %p'

It subtracts 0x900 bytes, just like it should, so it includes StackSystem. How did it
manage to get so much below stackguard? Doesn't make any sense yet. :-/ Need to try and
get ahold of some W2K machine...
